TEXT.English: The World Trade Center (WTC or Twin Towers) was a complex in Lower Manhattan whose seven buildings were destroyed in 2001 in the September 11 attacks. The original World Trade Center was designed by Minoru Yamasaki in the early 1960s using a tube-frame structural design for the twin 110-story towers. The World Trade Center was one of the world's largest gold depositories was stored underneath the World Trade Center, owned by a group of commercial banks.
